T02D3495:149b-1: mri tyu banytsa na t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3495:149b-3: 'chi ba slu ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3495:149b-4: sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3495:149b-5: sngon ma bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug par bsgoms nas /
T02D3495:149b-6: chu skyes dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3495:149b-7: t'am yig las byung zla ba'i gdan //
T02D3495:149b-8: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D3495:149b-9: mchog sbyin dang ni autpal bsnams //
T02D3495:149b-10: ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od //
T02D3495:149b-11: zla ba'i steng na yang dag bzhugs //
T02D3495:149b-12: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D3495:149b-13: bcu drug lo yi sku ldan rim //
T02D3495:149b-14: snying gar 'phags ma sgrol ma bsgom //
T02D3495:149b-16: re'u mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad //
T02D3495:149b-17: mngon par yongs su bskor gyur te //
T02D3495:149b-18: aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa //
T02D3495:149b-19: bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya //
T02D3495:149b-20: mkhas pas pa'i rtse gcig yid kyi ni //
T02D3495:149b-21: nges par brtan pos zla drug bsgom //
T02D3495:149b-22: yi ge bcu yi sngags 'di ni //
T02D3495:149b-23: mi skyo'i yid kyis bzlas par bya //
T02D3495:149b-25: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a //
T02D3495:149b-26: sgrol ma'i 'khor lo skom pa pos //
T02D3495:150a-2: dngos grub thams cad thob 'gyur zhing //
T02D3495:150a-3: 'chi ba'i skyon gyis mi gos so //
